item.title: Talks
item.description: Lectures for Great Ideas in Computer Science, Fall 2022 This is a course for freshmen at ACM Honor Class, SJTU, where I served as a teaching assistant. Complexity Analysis. Introduce simple lower bound analysis and time space complexity for Turing machine. Presentations for Theoretical Computer Science, Spring 2021 The Reachability Problem for Petri Nets is Not Elementary. This is a presentation with Lejun Min for the theoretical computer science course on Jun. 3, 2021. In this lecture, we introduce the latest results in [Czerwiński, Lasota, Lazić, Leroux and Mazowiecki, 2019] on the lower bound for reachability of VAS.
